radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral lung base heterogeneous airspace opacities, blunting of the right costophrenic angle suggestive of small pleural effusion, perihilar vascular congestion. Heart size is normal. No pneumothorax.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Bilateral lung base heterogeneous airspace opacities have progressed since prior exam. Small pleural effusion has increased since prior.
